title: Kingdom (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_kingdom_2.0.0.1.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: KINGDOM
Genre:	Strategy - Simulation - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (Vista, 7, 8, 10), Mac OS X (10.7+) and Linux (Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17)
Languages: Text only: PortuguÃªs do Brasil, Dansk, Deutsch, English, espaÃ±ol, Suomi, franÃ§ais, italiano, nederlands, norsk, svenska
Modes: Single-player
Released: October 21, 2015
Size: 183.9 MB
Company: Noio, Licorice / Raw Fury
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/kingdom

About:
Wise Rulers know their kingdom will fall,
Brave Rulers do not despair.
Great Rulers know their riches can rule,
And spend every coin with great care.
In Kingdom, each coin spent can tip the balance between prosperity and decay. Attend to your domain, border to border, or venture into the wild to discover its wonders and its threats. Master the land, build your defenses, and when the darkness comes, stand with your people, crown on your head, until the very end.
2D sidescrolling strategy/resource management hybrid with a minimalist feel wrapped in a beautiful, modern pixel art aesthetic.
Play the role of a king or queen atop their horse and enter a procedurally generated realm primed to sustain a kingdom, then toss gold to peasants and turn them into your loyal subjects in order to make your kingdom flourish.
Protect your domain at night from the greedy creatures looking to steal your coins and crown, and explore the nearby, mysterious forests to discover curious and cryptic artifacts to aid your kingdom.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: Dual Core
Memory: 1 GB RAM
DirectX: Version 10
Hard Drive: 512 MB available space

Recommended system requirements - Windows: 10
Memory: 4 GB RAM
DirectX: Version 10
Hard Drive: 1 GB available space
